sentences.sContent: The rim of the teacup is chipped.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rim of the teacup is chipped.

sentences.sContent: " said the director, "we fill up a bathtub, and we offer a teaspoon, a teacup, and a bucket to the patient and ask him to empty the bathtub.
sentences.sContent_eng: " said the director, "we fill up a bathtub, and we offer a teaspoon, a teacup, and a bucket to the patient and ask him to empty the bathtub.
sentences.sCn: “呃… …”院长说，“是这样，我们先给一个浴缸放满水，然后我们给病人一个调茶匙，一个茶杯和一个水桶去把浴缸�面的水放清。”

phrases.pCn: 小题大做；小事引起的大风波

trans.tranOther: a cup that you serve tea in
